items.title: Celebrate
items.description: And eyes beholding radiance. And the gnats' flickering dance. And the seas' expanse. And death, and chance.

items.title: Rivers of You
items.description: A short piece which plays with the pronouns 'I' and 'you', and floats somewhere between on the beat of broken sentences.

items.title: Father Time
items.description: Some rare biographical writing about my experiences in England while studying, and all of the many ways in which it is possible to traverse time.

items.sidebarTitle: There's You In Everything I Do
items.title: There's You In Everything I Do
items.description: Consider again that every 'I' who speaks implies a 'you' who is listening, in whose response that 'I' will become 'you'.
